data.eml:eml: Four new crane fly species of subgenus Tipula (Vestiplex) (Diptera, Tipulidae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Starkevich, Pavel, Men, Qiu-Lei, Saldaitis, Aidas (2019): Four new crane fly species of subgenus Tipula (Vestiplex) (Diptera, Tipulidae) from China. Zootaxa 4679 (1): 69-86, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4679.1.4
